TopicTitle: Maintain aspect ratio on low resolutuins.

Articles.Content:
I know that i am not the only one that tries to play with all settings turned to off and playing in 800x480 resolution (from the launcher)

But what i want to know is why when i play 800x480 resolution fullscreen and windowed it cuts off stuff, why cant the game be made to just work at lower resolutions i have serious fps problems and 800x480 cuts off science button on building

I have tried turning min distance to 3 on all planets to avoid playing in this res, but little changed Please help is there a way to play in this resolution? or do i just have to lag in 1024x700

KSP is designed to run on resolutions of 1024x768 or larger. If you get smaller than that there simply isn't enough space on the screen to display all the UI elements properly. The resolution you're trying to KSP on is simply said too low, what are your system specifications? The minimum specifications for KSP are defined as follows:

  • OS:Windows Vista/7/8, OSX or a Debian based Linux
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM3 512MB VRAM
  • Hard Drive: 1 GB HD space
